website_summaries.verdict: Although less stylish than some other options, users are generally satisfied with this protective pouch's capacity and comfort.
pros: Six shielded sleeves protect cards from RFID scanners
Aluminum zippers won't set off metal detectors
cons: Some seams are glued, not stitched

customer_reviews.title: secures belongings until the zipper falls off.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the RFID Money Belt earlier this year for European trip for the summer. My previous trip to Europe resulted in having my iPhone stolen from my back pack. The RFID Money Belt definitely secured my important items this time, including my pass port, cell phone, wallet, & credit cards. It was well hidden on my body from the pick pocket professionals. However after a week of using it, the zipper simply fell off the pouch. I needed to use a pair of scissors to open the pouch to retrieve my item stored within it. Therefore, although it did secure my belongings, I did not think it was going to last only for a one time use.
customer_reviews.author: Paramedicgator

customer_reviews.title: ... apprehensive about wearing a money belt because they look pretty uncomfortable. But I figured better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about wearing a money belt because they look pretty uncomfortable. But I figured better safe than sorry, especially since I would be using the train system extensively in Italy where pickpockets tend to hang out. I was pleasently surprised that it was incredibly comfortable. I was able to keep two passports, cash, credit cards, and a cellphone and forgot that I was wearing it at all. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Alpha Keepers and after my husband and I used them three times, one of the zippers broke. More specifically, the large compartment zipper will zip back and forth but the compartment stays open. Needless to say it is defective and an inferior product for the money. I tried contacting the manufacture but they will not stand behind their product. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Unbearably loud crunching noise
customer_reviews.text: This money belt makes an unbearably loud crunching noise when it bends or gets deformed in any way through normal course walking. At first I thought maybe this is due to some kind of RFID material in the lining, but actually the RFID protectors seem to be provided as separate sheathes that need to be slid over cards / passports before you put them in the money belt. I purchased another money belt sold here on Amazon by Raytix and found it to be a superior product with no crunching noise.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and minimal bulk
customer_reviews.text: This RFID blocking passport/credit card belt will be our weapon against pickpockets, both traditional and electronic as we travel to known crime hotspots this summer. The extra pack of passport and card sleeves for use when you are not wearing the belt is a nice extra. My one criticism is that it takes the minutest, slightest, squeeze of the clasp to unhook the belt. So I am worried about loss of the belt due to this flaw. I might disable this clasp with tape and just step into the belt instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey the Barak

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned about how comfortable it was going to be to wear it but ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from 8 day trip where I used the money belt. I was concerned about how comfortable it was going to be to wear it but found it fit just fine (small waist - long torso) and it was very comfortable. In fact, you forget you are wearing it. As other reviewers have said, it is not a substitute for purse type things but does the trick for slender wallets, credit cards, money or other small valuables. I will be using it in the future for hiking and long walks when carrying a purse isn't feasible.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Mom

customer_reviews.title: A great money belt.
customer_reviews.text: A great money belt. It holds much more than it appears to be able to hold. The added protection of RIFD makes it perfect for airports, and other areas that require removing and scanning/xray of belts etc. I can feel comfortable in crowded areas where there may be an opportunity of identity thieves try to read credit cards and identification cards. It was expeditiously shipped. The package also contained addition RIFD products, at no additional cost, that I was able to put to use immediately. I must add that it is extremely comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Holds what I need it to and fits under my clothes when I want
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered the same item (though evidently a different brand of exactly the same item. I like it because it just holds my phone, cards, some cash, and a stylus , and a piece of paper or two. It fits under my clothes when I want it to for protection, though it does not lie flat unless nothing is in it. I know nothing about RFID blocking sleeves and didn't keep the weird things that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dora A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: The money belt and RFID sleeves have accompanied me on many trips abroad. The security features are excellent. The belt, with an adjustable strap, is NOT bulky and hides beneath my pants easily. The pouch is roomy and allows me to carry my passport, paper documents and, of course, money and credit cards. I feel secure covering my passport and credit cards with the RFID sleeves. Each sleeve is sturdy cardboard and holds up well with handling. I highly recommend the money belt and protective sleeves!
customer_reviews.author: P. L.

customer_reviews.title: good hidden pack!
customer_reviews.text: flat, flat, flat! surprised how much it holds! hides nicely, fits passport easily, the large iphone+, sweat didn't saturate, good zippers on multi pockets to separate change/bills, hidden pocket, wash/dry during travel easily..... will use again since i have them but had to keep lifting my shirt to get to my stash, passport.. might plan ahead if your shopping and have some bills out. feels secure around waist, could tuck it inside waistband for that extra security with no bulkiness. no issues going thru airport security. great for travel, concerts any where you don't want to carry/hold $, keys, phone... very surprised how much it holds and still stays thin
customer_reviews.author: mommaA

customer_reviews.title: “RFID Sleeves ARE TOO THICK to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have not actually used the belt yet but I like the design and that it has RDIF protection. My issue is with the “sleeves.” They are very stiff and thick and they only hold one card and even then one has to really yank the card out of the sleeve. I had thought to use them in my wallet but they are too thick and take up too much space. Frankly, I couldn’t think how I could use them and so they sit on my table. I have other RFID paper sleeves that hold 3 cards easily and I use these in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: ...fit is great.
customer_reviews.text: So far...so good. I tried it on but haven't traveled with it yet. The fit is great, but the actual belt & buckle appear a bit flimsy compared to my last travel belt. The pockets are a good size and will hold quite a few items including my passport. Lightweight, nearly flat and fits nicely under a shirt.I really do like the RFID feature. It is an upgrade to my former belt
customer_reviews.author: RonP

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for a trip to Liberia. This is so comfortable that I often forgot I had it on. Very easy to put on and the strap works well. For some who may have had bad experiences with the strap, it may be better to adjust the strap length longer rather than stretch it too much. My large Samsung cell phone could fit but was uncomfortable to wear in this. I kept my passport, immunization card, business cards, cash, and a small 1/2 size wallet in this travel belt. It was very convenient to pull out my IDs or money in the airport or wherever needed - more so than a regular wallet in the back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a trip to Cambodia and it gave me piece of mind that all my money was safe. I put a few card and my passport but it is so thin that it feels bulky to carry around the passport . It does seem to be breathable material so you aren’t sweaty around your waist. It was highly adjustable as well. It’s been about 4 years and still looks in good shape. Granted, i don’t really use it often, just for international travel.
customer_reviews.author: HufflepuffMom

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for my mama
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a beige for my mom’s upcoming travel but she insisted this color so I returned the beige and got dark brown. She loves it so I love it too, but I did like the beige one better, for the the whole point of wearing it under your shirt. I feel like brown would show under her white shirts. Moving onto the item itself. The elastic belt is good, enough room for wider waisted people. The buckle is plastic, but I believe the zipper is metal so I’m unsure about it passing TSA metal detector. It’s very light and seems hand-washable. If this lasts her whole trip, I’ll soon purchase one for myself for my upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: RFID protection at it's best!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We used this on our most recent trip to Barcelona. This city has the highest percentage of pickpocketing, so we were looking for a product where we would feel safe moving around in large crowds. This belt was comfortable and has been very durable. It was also nice to receive the RFID protectors, which I use in my own wallet. I work for a company in the RFID industry, so I wanted to see how well the protectors work. Anything inside of the protector cannot be read as a verified this with some of our RFID readers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Holds 4 Passports easily, slim fit, can wear on waist or cross-body
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our family's recent trip to France. It easily held our four passports, some additional papers, and an extra credit card or two (with room to spare). It was comfortable to wear on my waist, but I quickly realized that wasn't practical to get things in/out with a hiking pack on, so it's also comfortable to wear cross-body (with the pouch on my chest), making it very accessible without getting in the way. No signs of wear and the buckle was secure; I'll be using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item was advertised to include 7 RFID blocking sleeves that could be used in addition to the money belt. The money belt was received and used on a recent trip. It was comfortable, lightweight, and easy to conceal under a shirt. It would have been really great to also have the RFID blocking sleeves but they were not included in the package with the money belt. Also the seller sent and email stating if I had any problems to contact them and they hoped I was happy with the purchase. I would have contacted the seller but the email specifically stated "Do Not Respond To This Email!"
customer_reviews.author: Rufus Adams

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky, caused skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I actually met a guy on my flight who was wearing the exact same money belt. For me, it's too bulky. The mesh backing irritated my skin after prolonged hours of being worn against the skin. The elastic belt took some fiddling with to get it to fit right - there are 2 different parts of the belt you need to move to tighten or loosen. It's well made, strong construction, just too bulky for me: I'm 5'4", 130lbs, so the belt was almost as wide as me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lightweight 'fanny' pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Europe but didn't want bulk in a fanny pack. I have about a 44 in waist and had no trouble extending the strap to fit. The pouch stayed put without moving around and the strap was stretchy so I didn't have to remove the whole thing when using the restroom and risking forgetting it in the stall. It truly is slim--put a bunch of receipts and coins in it and it got a little heavy but never lost its shape or function. Kept everything secure and was barely visible under my tshirt. Often didn't even feel that I had it on. A nice alternative to a bulky fanny pack yet it's also secure.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and thin
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these for our cruise to the Carribean. Unlike some other money belts, these are not rough and scratchy against your skin. They can be worn in several ways including at the waist, slipped under the belt line, and cross-shoulder and under the arm. They are nice and thin, have several pockets, and truly hold everything I need. Don't think a cell phone in a case will fit, but I don't intend to use it that way anyway. Can't attest to longevity since we haven't used them long enough. Update: worked great on our trip. Surprisingly held lots of cash, passport, credit cards and drivers license, and Galaxy S5 in an Otterbox Defender case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item to protect and secure you valuables
customer_reviews.text: My first impression is that it is well made, comes with extra sleeves for credit cards if you don't want to wear the entire belt, lot's of room for all the things it's made to carry concealed, will carry much more if worn outside your clothes, watches rings glasses scarves personal grooming accessories etc etc. Elastic seems strong and clasp seems like a good one, now, race you to the airport!! Best wishes, tumbleweed216
customer_reviews.author: tumbleweed216

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, discrete money belt that fits passports
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, low-profile money belt that worked wonderfully when I travelled through Europe. I like knowing the added RFID blocking technology was there, even though I'm not sure how commonly that is used for theft. The belt was quite comfortable and very discrete, but easy to access as well when needed. I liked the fact that it fits a passport and I could keep it on me at all times. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It got torn so quickly- after just a few uses. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. At first I was annoyed that the strap ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this all over the world. Very comfortable. At first I was annoyed that the strap was so thin, but I actually preferred it that way. I like this pack a lot and fit my Samsung S8, all my travel tickets, my passport, my fat wad of Kenyan Shillings, my ID's and credit cards, my headphones, and other little trinkets. It also looked like I never wore this while clothed even with all of my items in it.
customer_reviews.author: jackson99559

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel aid
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly under my clothes as I shopped in Italy. Although I carried a satchel, a young merchant was surprised when I lifted my top to reveal the pack at my waist to pay for my purchase. He commented that it was a great idea. I was able to have my passport, currency, and cards in the different pockets without any bulk. I have recommended this item to friends and family who travel internationally and perhaps within the states.
customer_reviews.author: K. Munn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this pouch! Took it with me on my trip to London last year and it was comfortable and I felt safe with it on. I use it to go hiking locally, and it’s so convenient. It’s has lots of pockets, it’s lightweight, and you can actually store quite a bit in the pockets. A great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Shayweezyfbaby

customer_reviews.title: but super visible if you put your passport in it
customer_reviews.text: Worked out well for me, but super visible if you put your passport in it. If you just want to keep some cash and a few cards in it, it is pretty discreet, but other than that, not so much. Also disappointed that the RFID isn't built into it as it is for the one that hangs around your neck. I bought both, but my friend used the other style (and loved it). I prefer this style because I find it easier to use/see into the two zip pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Decent but set off TSA sensor at one airport
customer_reviews.text: Took this belt to europe over the summer and my husband wore it under his clothing. The RFID blocker sleeves set off the TSA sensor at one airport and he was half undressed before we figured out what the problem was. Wasn't expecting that to be an issue. Also, it was quite hot and sweaty against the skin, mostly because it was hotter than usual this summer. The performance of the belt is good though, and we were satisfied with the fit and ease of getting in and out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Gypsea

customer_reviews.title: The bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This bely is great for travel. It is light weight and held everything without me even feeling it was there. It held my CCs, IDs and cell phone. It also can be hidden with your shirt so you can not count it as a personal item when boarding a plane. Less bulky than a purse and secure. Great product and I am getting more for Xmas gifts for others.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: The belt was everything I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt for my trip to Ethiopia, a journey with a humanitarian purpose. The belt was everything I was hoping for! It kept my valuables (i.e. passport, cc, cash, and boarding pass) secure at all times. The belt was also very comfortable. The only time I would consider not wearing it was to go to sleep, and then I placed it under my pillow. Because of its size, sleeping with it underneath my head was a practical thing to do. Thank you for caring, and for putting out a great product. I would recommend it to any traveler who needs security.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Holds Stuff, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: To first address, does it block RFID? Not sure to be honest, but I did toy with it by putting security card keys in it and the sensors would not pick up a signal. So, I’ll assume it does. I am not a tech savvy person. As for storage, fitone iPhone 7 (put in back mesh sleeve), 4 passports, plane tickets, 4 credit cards and I still had some room, although it was snug at that point. Sits pretty flat on your belly or back. Belt could be wider in my opinion but this thing survived a 24 plus hour commute to Asia and back and throughout (over 2 weeks). Considering the price, got my money’s worth already. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kei Sasaki

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give five stars because the zippers got stuck a few times. Also I accidentally twisted the band once and now it's got a permanent kink. Otherwise it works fine. The RFID card sleeves aren't the most durable if you are constantly using items inside. I took it on a one week cruise that had lots of walking tours and it was comfortable, but I think the card sleeves will need to be replaced in a few months. I would purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Discrete
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt mostly to hide my valuables. The RFID is pretty much a gimmick if you do your research. I didn't even bother with the card sleeves. They are made of cardboard and only hold one card at a time. Also your not supposed to have those in the belt at the same time so what's the point? Anyway, the belt is very flat and works well if your only dealing with money and a passport.
customer_reviews.author: cazana

customer_reviews.title: You need this for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our vacation to Italy. This are comfortable and conceal well. They are easy to get to when you need to get to your cash, cards or even your iPhone (without case). You can’t tell you have one on and puts your mind at ease knowing that you can’t get pick pocketed. They are made of good quality and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a money belt.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Sun

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: I used this wallet for amusement parks with my kids and it was great. It fit my large iPhone, cash and credit cards, as well as a small key fob. And yet, it never was uncomfortable, or got in the way. It was easy to access, and contents didn’t fall out if I failed to zip it. It was perfect, and I think I’ll continue to use it on outings around home so I don’t need a purse or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money else where.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy construction, not worth the money. Card holders barely fit one card. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: R...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Mate
customer_reviews.text: I traveled overseas with about $9800 in cash in this thing. It was well concealed, easily accessible and easily adjustable. This is a great investment and I'm glad I have it and won't travel without it both stateside and internationally.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Used this during a vacation
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using this during a trip overseas. It's easy to conceal under a shirt and just beg enough to hold a passport and come cash. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M_217

customer_reviews.title: The fitting
customer_reviews.text: This item does not fit around my waist , my waist its a 38! And it says that it stretches till a 55, not!!! Very disappointed , and also there’s a video that shows those rfid cards don’t work! He was able to open his hotel room even with foil around it🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: brenda rosso

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for travel through Europe and love how easy it was to use. Keeps everything securely tucked away under my shirt. Has a lot of pockets for your passport, credit card, and cash. The only issue is that I went during April when the weather isn't that cold or hot but this did get a little warm against my skin after a full day's walk. It's nothing too detrimental.
customer_reviews.author: julie h

customer_reviews.title: Seems as described.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but I've tried it on and seems well built and as described. Plus, it comes with additional RFID sleeves, which reinforces the protection of one's contents. Exactly what I was looking for in regards to a waist belt because I've borrowed my brother's, which hangs from your neck and I find it annoying because you either have to lift your shirt to get your stuff out (if hiding it underneath) or let it hang on top of your shirt, which defeats the purpose of having your belongings and valuables hidden or out of sight during international travel.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Tigno

customer_reviews.title: Functional money ID holder.
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could wear it in New Orleans, because I just kept hearing about the crime, etc., and I was ultra paranoid. This lasted about a day for me. I was too uncomfortable with it, I didn't like having to go under my shirt every time I had to get my money or credit card out. I do like the cardholders, I still use those, but I gave the belt to my roommate. The elastic strap was too thin for me, and I just wasn't comfortable wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Samoyed mom

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Two nice zippered pockets with smaller mesh pockets inside the larger zippered pocket. I put money in one of the mesh pockets and credit cards in the other. You get 6 cardboard sleeves for credit cards, which is nice because then you can put one card in each and line them up inside the pockets or the mesh sleeves. You also get a large sleeve for your passport. Expandable belt so that you can adjust to put around your waist. I wore the money belt under my clothes and you could not tell, because it lies flat. Easy to pack because it lies flat in your suitcase and is very lightweight. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and thinness and the RFID blocking without having to use the RFID sleeves. My husband carries a trifold wallet that when it is opened up completely, it fits inside the money belt. He has used this when riding our motorcycle and doesn't have to worry about his wallet falling out of his back pocket. We plan to use the money belt on an upcoming trip overseas . My only concern at this time is the belt clasp seems to be light weight and not very strong. Time and use will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these. I wore mine every day for over a week trip and it was comfortable, not hot or irritating, and held cash and my passport without unsightly bulges through my shirt. While a very few others may have had problems with the zippers or clasp, ours worked perfectly and easily. I didn't use the rfid blocker on my passport but I did for the credit cards (one in the belt, another in my wallet that I carried in a pocket). But I didn't end up in any crowds so it probably didn't matter. We will definitely use these on future international trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S.

customer_reviews.title: Slim, Secure- Great for Hands Free Exercise or Travel!
customer_reviews.text: I use this while hiking and it stays in place, with only a few adjustments here and there. It lays flat and easily carries my iphone7 and keys. I had one similar to this that I used on a hiking trip in the UK and it was great to have the added security of having my important docs and money on my person at all times. Discrete under loose clothing. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Momsday

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not pouchy...it is flat yet roomy. We were able to keep all of the items when at the Mouse House safely in the rides and handy yet not waiting for someone to grab it. The bag was abloe to be tucked with a shirt over it very comfortably and was easy to get at. Nice material and the strap was comfortable and not binding nor did it dig in to the hip area.
customer_reviews.author: Quiltalong

customer_reviews.title: Safe, Secure and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these to try before ordering one for my husband. We both liked it so much we immediately ordered his. Update 9/24/2019 - If I could give it 10 stars I would. We just came back from a trip and this little Money Belt for Travel was PERFECT. My husband and I always knew our passport, credit card and cash were secure. We tucked between our pants and body so nobody was taking anything. Great travel product.
customer_reviews.author: GP Millward

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at how inconspicuous this is, especially ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how inconspicuous this is, especially since i am not as slim as the girls on the video. Wore it on two trips where the temp was around 40oC or over 100F, and hardly noticed it. Only problem is that you do need to be careful that things don't drop out when you are pulling stuff out. Lost some money when pulling out my passport and didn't notice the money falling out. Something that will be a problem with most pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Shanti

customer_reviews.title: RFID Sleeves did not work w/ subway card
customer_reviews.text: I was able to scan my subway card abroad while it was in one of the sleeves. For something that simple and lack of protection. This is not safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: USA

customer_reviews.title: Head & Shoulders Above The Rest!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at all Amazon had to offer, it was clear that this product was head and shoulders above the rest. Big enough to hold your cash and other important things LIKE YOUR PASSPORT :-), and not worry because they are strapped around you securely. Well constructed, good clasps and adjustable. We are looking forward to a safe and secure trip to Thailand. Once there, we plan on using them all the time. Theft is somewhat of a problem over there. We highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: FaFaHead

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect a refund if you plan to return
customer_reviews.text: I returned this to a kohl’s drop off location on 8/10/19. It is not 8/20/19 and I have not received my refund nor do I have control of of my package/confirmation that my item has been returned. DONT BUY. BUYERS BEWARE. They are a scam and refuse to provide a refund. In terms of the product itself, it was great. However, I ended up purchasing a backpack to travel with instead of a sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: High quality and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hidden belt for travel this winter. I am to my limit on luggage and needed something that I could conceal on my person so I didn't put money and passport in my carryon. This hidden money belt is high quality, flat and compact so easy to conceal, yet long and wide enough for money passport and phone. Back side has a net pouch for easy access . Soft elastic belt. The inside is nice with the RFID blocker. The pouches can not be used with the money best, they are to be used outside of the belt. This belt has a warranty which is a good sign. i look forward to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: top water jig

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure travel companion
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an older money belt and their one is way more comfortable. Wish had found this and purchased it much sooner. Easy to adjust and fits well under clothing (to keep hidden from strangers); easy to a access the pockets while wearing. The RFID blocking sleeves were a nice but unnecessary extra. [Especially the passport sized one as US Passports have no RFID readable info that can be used without being hooked to US State department database.]
customer_reviews.author: Northwest ELF

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!  Best I've tried, most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable to wear all day and on and off planes for 35 hours. Strap was just the right size, no slipping or stretching in two weeks of constant heat, humidity and use all day, every day. That, in and of itself, is amazing. Really appreciate the cut, the fit, the size, and the quality combined with security. Multiple secure pockets, no chance of spilling out the contents. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: TBS

customer_reviews.title: Very small size even for one small wallet and one passport
customer_reviews.text: Very small size even for one small wallet and one passport :(
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Kantaria

customer_reviews.title: Very smart design & great added value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, both, mentally: knowing you are doing all you can to keep your info private, as well as while wearing. Slim profile so you can wear it under your shirt. Very smart design with two inner mesh pockets in the larger zippered compartment. As well as the long pocket in the back. The extra rfid covers for 1 passport and 6 cards is a Great Added Value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: thanz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my backpacking trip
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I’m excited to use it for my trip to Asia. I like that the elastic band hugs my waist comfortably. I used the RFID sleeves that comes with it for my passport and 4 ID cards. I love that there’s a secret compartment behind and it’s cushioned. I prefer to wear it over a shirt anyway. I can now travel handsfree instead of using a sling bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Mari

customer_reviews.title: Money belt security
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that a money belt would be obvious under my clothing, but it is slim and discreet. I planned on using it while wearing yoga pants and a t-shirt and unless you're wearing skin tight clothing, this money belt will do the trick! It gives me another level of security knowing that it is hidden underneath my clothing - I'll be able to carry my cash, cards, I/D without worry!
customer_reviews.author: Mully

customer_reviews.title: Very Secure - Forgot I Was Wearing It
customer_reviews.text: Product was everything promised and more. Belt fit comfortably under my shirt and I felt very secure in carrying extra money and passport as I traveled in Italy for 2 Weeks. I forgot I was wearing it several times at that is how comfortable the straps and bag are constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wright

customer_reviews.title: Slim Profile
customer_reviews.text: The money belt has a flat profile even with my passport and wallet inside. I used it on a recent trip and wore the belt between my undershirt and shirt so it was not visible. It gave me peace of mind knowing that my passport, credit cards and money were safe. My belt arrived without the additional RFID sleeves, but the seller quickly resolved this and sent out the sleeves the next day. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SRL

customer_reviews.title: Good size with pockets and light color makes for versatile pack.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for carrying passport, currency, and important papers during travel or sightseeing. Fairly lightweight. Beige color for wearing under light-colored clothing is ideal. Think this item would be best to wear at waist, or even just below waist, but I am making it work just above waist under shirts that aren't too snug.
customer_reviews.author: willypickle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and secure
customer_reviews.text: We are planning our first trip abroad. I got the Alpha Keeper and immediately began testing it. It is very comfortable and easily hidden as long as your shirt is a little loose. I like the organization and that it clips in the front and has no hanging straps like my small waist packs. It is small and flat so don't expect to put a lot in it but it, holds my credit cards, passport, money, checkbook and change. If I am not worried about a little bulge, I can add my phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel - with some modification
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, good material! But having two belts if you already wear one are too much. So I modified it by cutting off the original belt (see photos). I attach it to my belt off center on the side of my waist. It works. I lost the mash packet, but it is not practical anyway because it's hard to reach. I assume manufacturer could offer this travel belt with similar design options.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the gray money belt and love the color. I am not sure why it was a few bucks less than the black one, but I figured under lighter colored shirts, the gray would work better. I have not used it yet, but on first inspection it seems very well made. When you get it, there is a product tag hanging on it with a bead chain. I discovered it is the PERFECT chain to hand my tiny luggage keys on! Small things that make you smile. Quck delivery. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Very well build and comfortable money belt.
customer_reviews.text: This money belt is very well constructed and comfortable to wear. I wore this during my 2 weeks in China this summer. It fit very comfortably under my shirt and had plenty of space for my Passport, IDs and Credit cards. The material on the back to prevent sweat build up is very soft and comfortable. It worked great on the hottest muggiest days of our trip. My one complaint is the "RFID blocking" sleeve for my passport fit extremely tight. This made pulling out and storing the passport a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for traveling safely
customer_reviews.text: This travel belt is great for keeping passports and boarding passes safe while traveling. I LOVE that it has RFID blocking and comes with the extra RFID blocking sleeves for credit cards and passports. It's a little bigger than I expected, but has lots of pockets for stuff and nice zippers. Unfortunately, I've now been designated as the passport carrier for the group since it's so nice.
customer_reviews.author: SMNumbers

customer_reviews.title: This product is sturdy and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I used this for our Europe trip and it sat snug under my belt carrying our passports, creditcards and spare cash. This product is sturdy and does the job. I did make one small modification in the way i wore it though. I used the chain that came attached holding the alpha keeper label to also connect unto my belt loop. This extra loop from the pouch to my jeans belt loop ensured that the pouch would be held in place and wont ride up or down while i walked. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chackoman

customer_reviews.title: Practically invisible and so reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these for myself and the other for my husband for our Disney World (several parks) visit because we didn’t want to carry backpacks etc. These alfa money belts were awesome they fit many things such as money, cards, keys, chapstick, feminine products, phone (iphone plus) etc and still maintained a flat/slim shape. belt itself is slim enough to go through belt loops if you perfer and strong and secure enough if not. My husband even carried cigarettes and the maintained shape and didn’t break. These belts were a game changer in so many ways and so much less bulky than a old traditional fannie pack. We loved them and will recommend these many times over.
customer_reviews.author: great game love it

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very quickly (actually got one for myself and one for my wife). We figure on wearing them on our cruise later this summer-wanted some way of holding c-phone, credit cards, money etc that didn't take up much room and left our hands free. I think these should work great! We both tried them on and the adjustable waist strap has plenty of room for adjustment to allow for a nice fit and feel for both of us. We really appreciate the RFID sleeves that they included with the waist pack. I'll do another review after our trip to see how they held up but from what I've seen after inspecting them thoroughly I think they should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetowing

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the RFID Money Belt from Alpha Keeper for my trip to the Philippines (3/22/18-04/01/18). It was delivered very quickly. It came exactly as described in the pictures. I was able to fit a lot in the money belt including my iPhone. I wore it under clothes and on top of my clothing at times. It was very convenient. It was comfortable to have on for an extended period of time. I utilized the RFID blocking sleeves that came with the money belt and found them to be very useful. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend this product to friends and others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for a European trip and loved it. Fits flat and is not bulky. Has plenty of pockets for passports, credit cards and my cell phone. The buckle is sturdy and strong. I wore the belt while zip lining and felt very confident with the security of my possessions.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable waist belt
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a money belt for a trip to Paris. I got the flesh color which worked out great under white tops. Best thing about this money belt is the soft finish on the adjustable waistband, it's very comfortable on. The mesh lining/slip pocket on the back keeps it from sticking. I'd like to see a small dot of Velcro on the slip pocket to secure the slip pocket. It would be difficult but not impossible for something to fall out. I ended up not using that part.
customer_reviews.author: CeeZee

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Grandfather's Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a trip we are planning to take to Europe. Read so many articles about the problem with pick-pocketing and RFID identity theft that we felt like we had to do something to protect ourselves from becoming victims. This product fits securely around your waist and is designed to fit under clothing. I can now look forward to our trip without feeling like I have to be paranoid about becoming a victim. Plus it provides enough space to store my passport, cash, credit cards and other valuables leaving me free to focus on enjoying my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert LaMontagne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect To Protect Credit Cards and IDs from Theft
customer_reviews.text: Alpha Keeper is well made flat and light weight. Works well to hide IDs and credit cards to protect from theft. We have a lot of purse snatching going on so decided to get this to carry my ids, and credit cards. Fits and hides well under clothing. Love the RFID protection it provides.
customer_reviews.author: bheiser

customer_reviews.title: Picture makes this appear much larger than it actually is.
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to use this, nothing fit inside unless you put only bills and passport. I had to force my passport wallet with credit cards into it. Nice if you dont plan to carry that much but not very practical considering that having credit cards with your cash and passport is a must when traveling international.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Works well, fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this every day for two months under my shorts. It stayed comfortable and breathed well. I appreciated the card sleeves, but by far the most useful was the passport sleeve. If you don't use it, like I didn't, your passport will come away from your adventures ever so slightly curved. All in all, I really liked it, and it was a great way to keep my passport and more money than I would otherwise be comfortable carrying on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY liked this money belt
customer_reviews.text: REALLY liked this money belt. It is comfortable and powerful. The mesh pocket in the back was especially helpful for storing things like train tickets and plane tickets, and I didn't see other money belts with this option. RFID threats are overrated IMHO, but I actually enjoyed the card holders. I left most of my credit cards in the belt, and having them in the card holders made me more at ease that they wouldn't bend. A great money belt.
customer_reviews.author: Crisis

customer_reviews.title: Slim, durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely please when I received this product. I bought this as a gift for my mom for her upcoming trip to Italy. My favorite thing about the belt is that it is slim and not bulky (as compared to others) making it easy to fit around the waist and even under clothing without being noticeable. I looked at several money belts before purchasing this one and although this one cost more compared to others, I am please with my purchase and feel I made the right decision. My family is interested in ordering more (including one for myself) for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secured, Comfy, and not Bulky!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a while looking for the prefect money on Amazon. Compared many and read all the reviews. This one is the perfect one for me. It's secured, comfortable, and not as big as the others. It's a bit smaller than the others which makes it less bulky. The back mesh reduces the sweat. The inside big zipper mesh separators allow to organize stuff better, instead of mixing everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase and great value
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful purchase and great value. I purchased the color taupe versatile and neutral and better camouflaging against skin and under clothes. The RFID card sleeves offer additional protection for credit card theft when used in tandem with the RFID Money Belt. My daughter is headed to New Zealand and I can rest assured that her identity will be well protected while travelling, whether in a taxi, on a bus or plane, or while running through the airport. The strap is adjustable. Very lightweight and durable fabric. Holds the essentials.
customer_reviews.author: CharmedTote

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! Used it for a trip to Italy. Convenient pocket set up with a mesh sleeve on the back that can hold an iPhone too. I am overweight 3x and it adjusted to comfortably fit my waist. My husband is fit and his fit him well too - great adjustability!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Belle

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Convenience and the Security
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent trip abroad. I loved the security it proved and the low profile it had while I was using it. It stayed secured and allowed me to easily access all the stuff I was storing in it. Truly found it useful!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Trofe

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonders on my travel. Free hands and comfortable. I never had to worry about losing or forgetting important items. Hides great under a loose fitting shirt and the belt is very flat as long as you don't try to stuff anything bulky or larger into it, which it will hold but defeats the purpose of how it was made flat to keep tucked away safe under your shirt. Very happy and impressed with this. Nice straps, buckle, and durable. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for traveling or festivals
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Super slim but fit everything important so perfectly inside. I carried my cards,cash,passport, loose coins and my iPhone 8 Plus. I used it everyday for almost three weeks traveling throughout the UK and Europe. Some shirts i was able to hide it under without it being noticeable other shirts it was more comfortable wearing on the outside. I was able to scratch off the print on the front for those who aren’t fans of the little design (OCD thing i just wanted it to be plain). I got mine in nude and my boyfriend got his in black. Here’s a picture....mine you can see and his is hidden under his shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this belt on a trip to Chile from US and back (30 hours one way and 48 hours returning without removing) and wore in under my shirt/pants at belt level and it was great. I had 5000 USD plus some cards and I could feel it but it wasn't noticeable nor uncomfortable. It adjusted easily and was easy to place and remove. It didn't make me sweat where I had it either. Nothing broke or tore even though my gut was pushing on it constantly, and it's now home and ready for another trip. Seems to be good quality and I recommend it to anyone who needs to hide money, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Easy to Protect your Identity!
customer_reviews.text: I am already aware of the RFID I have been using the slip covers for a few years now. I very much like the travel belt its light and comfy, I love the positive sayings on the RFID slip covers too and even one for my passport:)... Its a great package for a super price to protect my travel documents and all my cards being credit cards or even my drivers license... I will use this at home as well as travel since I hate caring a purse will use it for everyday around town:)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Money Belt!
customer_reviews.text: Really great money belt! I traveled with my wife in Europe for three weeks this summer, and I kept all my important docs/cards in this belt. Having traveled spent a semester in Europe 10 years ago and using a different money belt, I felt much more confident with this belt. More pockets, a dedicated passport pocket and credit card pockets! They thought of everything! So glad I bought it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SECURITY WITH COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely made pouch that contains six credit card RFID blocking sleeves and one RFDI passport sleeve. It is comfortable to wear and has three compartments including one in the back that keeps a cell phone snug, One caveat: Don't expect to use the credit card sleeves in your wallet. They are thick and relative inflexible compared to the U.S. Governments RFID blocking sleeves used for passport and Global Entry cards. Otherwise, a good product, orth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MVS

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, not necessarily for travel, but to not attract the attention of persons looking to do harm to others. Sad times we live in when you have to fear purse snatchers or worse. Wore one today while running errands and felt so much safer with it under my shirt and out of sight. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anne T. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: Traveling to Italy last year I was told about all of the pick pockets. I never saw that anywhere. I used it for a couple of days and it was comfortable and easy to use. It held a couple of passports as well as my wallet. It wasn't sweaty like I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: Great money belt
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, soft, and comfortable. I used this while backpacking around Europe this summer and it definitely served it's purpose. The only downside for me was that it is a lot bigger than I expected, so it didnt fit under my clothes as subtley as other people (but im also pretty small, size 25 waist, so I'm sure if you're a little bigger than me then it would work fine)
customer_reviews.author: PatradTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for travel abroad, but found I use it often when I don't want to carry a purse and can just slip my id and cc's/ cash. It is so comfortable I forget its there till I need it. I really like the style, the clip in the front, the adjustable + elasticity of the band, and the amount of dividers. Very happy with this, recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: A great bonus was the credit card sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Money Belt for my husband and it arrived when we expected to and he tried it on and found it to be exactly what he wanted. Most of his shirts he wears on the outside of his pants and there was very little detection of him having this particular money belt on. Could not see it through his shirts. A great bonus was the credit card sleeves. We will see how it holds up through our trip, but my husband is very pleased with it so far. Comfortable ! Thank You and will report back with more details after our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Sedleski

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this money belt daily when in Italy and felt very secure. I wore it under my shorts and shirt, and it was easy to reach the top zippers to get money or items when needed. The belt fit nicely under my clothes and was invisible to others. The clip for the belt is simple and quick to connect and disconnect and the elastic band was easy to adjust to get the right size fit. I have a larger than average waist and it fit me fine, with adjustability for much smaller waists as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what you put in it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. Didn't make me too hot. Be careful that you don't put anything metal in it if you are wearing it through security at the airport. Passport, credit cards and paper money are fine. But if you've put coins or in my case a name tag with a metal clip, you better remember to take it off going through security or be prepared for a pat down.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allred

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL what you are buying. Apparently, some ...
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL what you are buying. Apparently, some of the belts (the ones that are $2 cheaper) are NOT RFID protected. I did not realize this as most of the description touts the RFID design/protection yet some of them are NOT RFID integrated....kind of defeats the purpose of buying it. I wish this was more clear when i bought it b/c now i just have a "regular" money belt with RFID inserts....but i admit it was my fault for not reading the description clearly in the rush of holiday buying...
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, subtle and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product while traveling for a month through Vietnam and Thialand. Worked very well, multiple pockets are great for multiple currencies and passport. Easy to put money and passport securely in pouch and wear under clothing without being visible. Weather was hot and muggy while traveling and while pouch did get warm it was not uncomfortable and did not rub on bare skin. All in all very happy with my purchase and it 100% met my traveling needs! Only complaint would be belt size was too large for me even fully tightened. I am 5’7” and usually wear a size 4-6
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Burres

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: I tested this on a long trip starting in Europe to New England. I wore it under a tee shirt. I LOVE having both hands free, felt more secure, and I hardly knew it was on. At several locations we were warned about pick pocketers and with this one, I felt safer. I recommend this money belt.
customer_reviews.author: Violetnut

product_meta.title: RFID Money Belt For Travel With RFID Blocking Sleeves Set for Daily Use
feature_bullets: Money Belt for Travel - RFID Money belt for Travel (size: 10 x 5.2 x 0.2 with long adjustable elastic strep), Comes with a set of Six RFID blocking sleeves for Credit Cards and One for Passport, Great for Daily Use
ULTIMATE GIFT FOR TRAVELERS - Are your Parents, Brothers, or your best friends planning to travel? Give them this money pouch and practical gift which will protect them
NO MORE CONCERNS NEXT TIME YOU VISIT THE AIRPORT - With Our hidden waist Money belt, you will feel zero stress, hands-free, and comfortable
NOT ONLY FULL IDENTITY THEFT PROTECTION - Now you have enough place to store and hide your belongings like your iPhone, Keys, Money, Credit cards, Documents, Passport and more
BUY CONFIDENTLY with our 100% Money Back Guarantee - If you are not satisfied with our product for any reason, you will receive a full refund with no questions asked and hassle-free.
